name: Adrenalin eSystems Limited
description:
Adrenalin is a web-based human resource software that automates the entire HR processes to boost productivity. In pursuit of this mission at our various customer places, we not only position our product as a solution but we supplement our product solution with a host of service offerings that helps our customers to realize the Return on Investment quickly. 
  
Adrenalin, is a comprehensive solution that covers every aspect of the HR process spectrum: Workforce Administration, Recruitment, Performance Management, Talent Development, Payroll, HR Analytics, Enterprise Collaboration and Mobile. 

Adrenalin’s experience and knowledge gained as a result of being a ‘pure-play vendor’ over the years has been invested in re-engineering the product to bring in a modern interface, making it accessible on smartphones and tablets, besides bringing in faster access to forms and simpler ways to complete transactions. 

Adrenalin has 20+ years of successful operations, Established Quality Management Practices and Dedicated investments in user and product research programs.

enhanced_description: Adrenalin eSystems offers Adrenalin MAX HCM Suite, a comprehensive web-based human resource software designed to automate entire HR processes and boost productivity. The solution aims to design a complete employee experience, covering every aspect of the HR process spectrum including Workforce Administration, Recruitment, Performance Management, Talent Development, Payroll, HR Analytics, Enterprise Collaboration, and Mobile capabilities. With over 20 years of successful operations as a pure-play vendor since its launch in 2002, Adrenalin has re-engineered its product with a modern interface, mobile accessibility on smartphones and tablets, faster access to forms, and simpler transaction completion. The company supplements its product with a host of service offerings to help customers quickly realize Return on Investment, underpinned by established Quality Management Practices and dedicated investments in user and product research programs.
